about.headline: From Metallurgy to Modern Web
paragraphs: My journey began in Metallurgical Engineering, where precision and problem-solving are paramount.
Today, as a Software Engineer, I forge elegant code and intuitive user experiences with the same passion and precision.
Whether it's building a responsive web app, designing a mobile app, or crafting a seamless UX, I bring dedication and technical excellence to every project.
